section.title: <xar:while />
section.t: Contains template data evaluated while the expression specified in the 'condition' attribute is true.

t.t: PHP expression evaluating to true or false. During the while loop this expression is evaluated each time at the start of the loop and while the value is true, the child tags are added to the output repeatedly. For comparison operators see the Note on logic tags

t.artwork:
<xar:while condition="list($uid, $uname) = each($user_result)">
        // stuff executing as long a the expression is true
        </xar:while>
